-- This file is generated from ExampleFile.ump --

MODULE Status
  
  VAR 
    state : { Open , Closing , Closed , Opening , HalfOpen }; 
    transition : { buttonOrObstacle , reachBottom , reachTop };  
    
  ASSIGN
    init(state) := Open;   
     
  TRANS
    (state = Closing) -> (
        (transition = buttonOrObstacle & next(state) = Opening)  |
        (transition = reachBottom & next(state) = Closed)   ) |
    (state = Opening) -> (
        (transition = buttonOrObstacle & next(state) = HalfOpen)  |
        (transition = reachTop & next(state) = Open)   ) |
    (state = Open) -> (
        transition = buttonOrObstacle & next(state) = Closing ) |
    (state = Closed) -> (
        transition = buttonOrObstacle & next(state) = Opening ) |
    (state = HalfOpen) -> (
        transition = buttonOrObstacle & next(state) = Opening )
